data.title: Sky Meadow Country Club
data.text:
Welcome to Sky Meadow, where we strive to exceed your expectations by providing unparalleled facilities, amenities, and personalized services. As a premier, private country club, we take great pride in offering a level of attention to detail that sets us apart from the rest. Whether you're on the golf course, attending a special event, enjoying live entertainment, or indulging in our exceptional dining options, you'll experience the hallmarks of excellence that define Sky Meadow. Our commitment to providing exceptional experiences extends to our pool, court facilities, and all areas of our club. Come discover what sets us apart and experience the ultimate in hospitality.

We proudly invite you to discover all that Sky Meadow has to offer, Love Where You Golf

Book a tour with us by calling 603-888-9000 X 252

Winner for 2023 - Best Golf Course in New Hampshire

MEMBERSHIP

Over the last three years, Sky Meadow has undergone a remarkable transformation. Our golf course is now impeccably maintained, surpassing all previous standards. The ballroom, a frequent venue for our events, has been elegantly modernized. We've introduced an inviting outdoor patio and bar, a well-appointed cart barn, a refined fine-dining restaurant, and so much more. Join us for a tour to discover what that led us to receive the prestigious 2023 Best Golf Course Award in the state of New Hampshire.

LEARN MORE

WEDDINGS

Your wedding day marks one of life's most extraordinary momentsâ€”a day overflowing with love and happiness. Yet, we recognize that orchestrating this magical event can be a daunting task. At Sky Meadow, we stand ready to assist you in crafting your dream day effortlessly. Our seasoned team of experts is wholeheartedly devoted to delivering tailor-made assistance and direction throughout your journey. From addressing your every inquiry to providing seasoned counsel, our unwavering dedication ensures your wedding day not only fulfills your imagination but surpasses it. Allow us to transform your wedding day into a celebration of your love story.

LEARN MORE

BANQUETS & EVENTS

Sky Meadow Country Club is a premier destination, offering breath-taking views, well-appointed surroundings and white glove service. Our golf is exceptional and all of our non-golf events are held to the same exact quality and standards. We take pride in going the extra mile to ensure that every event we host is nothing short of perfect. At Sky Meadow, we're known for our talented and professional staff, who are dedicated to helping you create the event of your dreams. Whether you're planning a wedding, corporate event, or social gathering, we'll work with you every step of the way to make it an unforgettable experience. Come see why Sky Meadow is the perfect choice for your next event.

LEARN MORE

OUTINGS

Whether you're a seasoned pro or picking up a club for the first time, our events cater to all skill levels, creating an inclusive and welcoming atmosphere for everyone. Our dedicated team works tirelessly to ensure each tournament and outing is a memorable affair. From meticulously manicured fairways to impeccable service, we leave no stone unturned to make your experience unforgettable. Join us and tee off with fellow golf aficionados, all while enjoying breathtaking views and delicious cuisine. Whether you're aiming for the title or simply seeking a day of leisurely golf, Sky Meadow has something for everyone.

LEARN MORE
